official_title: VidRT: Video Distraction During Radiation Therapy to Decrease Use of Pediatric Sedation
inclusion_criteria:
* All races and genders will be included.
* Patients with all tumor types will be included.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 3 Years
Must have maximum age of 13 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Patients < 3 years and > 13 years of age will be excluded.
* Patients with underlying movement disorders will be excluded.
